Katya refrained to protest about the fact that her mech was by far better 
then those made on Terra. It was irrelevant and she knew it. What bothered 
her was the efficiency of Owlhawk considering these radiations.

Katya: Is there a mean to counteract the radiations?


>From: Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com

>OOC: I'm making this up as I go along, sorry if it
>goes against anything that's already been stated.
>
>BIC:  Owlhawk:  It's that glowing stone I showed you
>back at the base.  It's the reason we aquired Beast
>Modes.  We use it for power, but to much of it can
>cause damage in robot mode.  Earth is rich in it, and
>has enormous amounts of radiation.  My guess is that
>you're not affected by it because you're an organic,
>and your suit is not affected by it, because it was
>first developed here on Earth.
>
